body_html: As a quick note, the tf.one_hot() method appears to be arriving in the next release of TensorFlow. I haven't checked, but it may also be available already in the nightly build- see the instructions to install it here
body_text: As a quick note, the tf.one_hot() method appears to be arriving in the next release of TensorFlow. I haven't checked, but it may also be available already in the nightly build- see the instructions to install it here
body: As a quick note, the [`tf.one_hot()`](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/api_docs/python/array_ops.html#one_hot) method appears to be arriving in the next release of TensorFlow. I haven't checked, but it may also be available already in the nightly build- see the instructions to install it [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow#installation)
